turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Maalik (2016 film).
turn.2: Maalik (2016 film)  Maalik (Urdu مالک) is a 2016 Pakistani political-thriller film directed, written and produced by Ashir Azeem.
turn.4: It was released on 8 April 2016 in cinemas across Pakistan under the production banner of Media Hub.
turn.6: The film was banned in Pakistan for political reasons after being cleared by all three Censor Boards of the country with Universal (Unrestricted) rating, opposition parties in Pakistan welcomed the film for showing reality and the KPK govt allowed screening of 'Maalik' .
turn.7: What are some other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Maalik is the only Pakistani film to be banned by the Federal Govt after being cleared by all Censor Boards.
turn.10: The film has a big cast with Ashir Azeem, Farhan Ally Agha, Sajid Hassan, Hassan Niazi, Adnan Shah, Rashid Farooqi, Ehteshamuddin and Tatmain ul Qulb in the lead roles.
turn.12: Maalik narrates their stories; A Pathan family that escapes from the ravages of the Soviet war in Afghanistan and settles in Karachi.
